name: Start URLs
description: Paste here a URL(s) of a specific place you want to get reviews from.

name: Limit reviews for each place
description: Use a large value (for example 1 million) to get all reviews from each place.

name: Only reviews since date (YYYY-MM-DD)
description: It is a date where the scraper stops loading older reviews

name: Scrape reviewer info
description: Scrape reviewer info (name, profile picture, location etc.). You should only extract reviewer's info if you have a legit reason to do so.
